snippet: Some major shareholders in Xstrata spoke out against a deal that would create a global diversified mining company with a market value of nearly $90 billion.
abstract: Some major shareholders in Xstrata spoke out against a deal that would create a global diversified mining company with a market value of nearly $90 billion.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Glencore International's proposed takeover of the mining company Xstrata has the potential to create a global commodities giant, but the deal still needs to win shareholder support.

headline.main: Big Xstrata Shareholders Balk at Glencore Takeover
